name: Cube Fight (Vektiz)
description:
You circle around a large cube, and shoot red cubes, not much else lol

Part of the GMTK 2021 game jam

ignore the file name btw, this was originally gonna be a puzzle game lmao

OH and also the game will probably not work because Sprite Shape renderers wanted to commit DIE last minute >:(

Music:

Voxel Revolution - Kevin Macleod

Limit 70 - also Kevin Macleod
